import { useContext } from "react" import Global from "../../context/Global" import { PostType } from "../../types/Interfaces" import { Card } from "react-bootstrap" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import classes from './Post.module.css' const Post = ({postTitle, postBody, authorLogin, createdDate}: Omit) => { const {localStore} = useContext(Global) return (

{authorLogin}

 {postTitle} {postBody} ) } export default Post
